articles.author: Daisy Grant
articles.blurb: If you’ve ever wondered what the love child of a reality dating show and a logic puzzle would be, look no further than MTV’s _Are You The One_? And this year, the puzzle is getting even harder.

headline.text: Sexually fluid cast of MTV’s ‘Are You The One?’ shows surprisingly strong representation

articles.author: Christine Condon
articles.blurb: The University of Maryland’s Hornbake Library is planned to lose student study space this fall.

headline.text: UMD students will lose some study space in Hornbake Library this fall
